Dear Customer, please click on {0} to view the sanctioned terms pertaining to your Loan application No.{1}. Your acceptance for the sanctioned terms is mandatory to progress further in the loan application journey - IndusInd Bank
Consent for the keyfact statement terms is already provided!
$$ - Non-refundable fees/ charge, even if the loan is not availed/cancelled subsequently
In the event of failure or non-compliance as specified below, the Lender shall be entitled to levy penal charges along with applicable Goods and Service Tax (GST) at prescribed rate(s).
Director/ Partner/ Proprietor/ Proprietrix/ Karta/ Manager

1)The bank reserves the right to consider the Loan Application based on merits of the case and the Bank’s decision shall be final and binding. Before disbursement, Bank may decide to reject the loan processing, basis any adverse data gathered concerning you / your loan application.
2) All Vehicle / Equipment Loans are sanctioned on Fixed ROI basis and Home Loans are Sanctioned on a Floating ROI basis unless specified otherwise.
3) In the case of fixed ROI loans The Customer IRR (ROI) as mentioned of in the Sanction Letter, is arrived at based on the Bank’s current applicable MCLR (inclusive of tenor premium) + MARGIN for fixed rate loans
The following shall be the material terms and conditions which the Borrowers shall note, agree and undertake to strictly adhere/comply with respect to loan proposed:

For Physical Consent
I/ We have noted and understood the contents of detailed Sanction Letter and Key Fact Statement (as above) shared with us in physical format and confirm that, I/ We are agreeable to the same, in its entirety. I We further confirm that, the contents were read over, explained and translated to us in person, in the language understood by me/ us, by the representatives of the Bank, and I/ We unequivocally confirm that, the same were understood in full.

1.Ensure payment of the loan dues/instalment, fees and charges along with applicable taxes and duties levied, on the scheduled dates without any delay or default.
2. Ensure to provide/deliver to the Lender :
i. Original Invoice with Hypothecation in favour of the Lender
ii. Insurance Policy taken or duly renewed with hypothecation in favor of the Lender
iii. Tax Paid Receipt (Motor Vehicles Tax any other statutory levies as applicable)
iv. Permit/ License and Renewals
v. Registration Certificate (RC) with Hypothecation in favor of the Lender
vi. URC/ UAC issued by Government/Nodal Dept. (applicable for MSME/MSE)
vii. Proof of Security creation of the asset and collateral properties (MODT/ROC/ CERSAI)
viii. Installation certificate in case of the machinery / equipment
I/ We request the Bank to proceed further and go ahead with loan booking and disbursement accordingly.

3. Provide repayment mandate to the Lender for honoring the loan instalments and other dues
4. Ensure that repayment mandate is duly honored as and when presented by the Lender for recovering the loan dues
5. Ensure the Bank Account form which the repayment mandate has been issued is in "operative" for the entire loan tenure.
6. Ensure that the asset / vehicle is used for authorized purposes only.
7. Provide documents/proofs as and when requested by the Lender within the stipulated time for any audit / other requirements of the lender.
8. Ensure that his Loan account is not classified as NPA/SMA/RFA/FRAUD.
Annex A Key Facts Statement Financial Terms as per loan sanctioned are:
"0 (same day, as the date of disbursement, in case of Instalment in Advance scheme) or 30/ 60/ 90/ 120/ 150/ 180 Days (basis Instalment in Arrears scheme)"
Applicable as per the respective State’s Stamp Act ($)
Penal charges, if any, in case of delayed payment
Non submission of property collateral documents / MOTD if stipulated
Non submission of installation certificate for equipment / machinery
Charges for switching of loans from floating to fixed rate and vice versa
300 + GST per month or part thereof for delays post invoicing of over 90   days
500 + GST per month or part thereof for delay over 90 days from due date
500 + GST per month or part thereof for delay over 30 days from loan date
5000 + GST per month or part thereof for delays over 30 days + all   penalties levied by ROC to be borne by customer additionally
5000 + GST per month or part thereof of delay over 60 days
5000 + GST per month or part thereof of delay after 60 days from Loan   date or installation completion date whichever is later
Being fixed ROI loans "no reset of interest" is applicable

300 + GST per month or part thereof for delays post invoicing of over 90 days/ every annual renewal due date. For Affordable Home Loans, Borrower to ensure that, property is duly and properly insured for all risks including Fire, Explosion, Cyclone, Storm, Flood and Inundation, Civil Riots & Commotion etc., with hypothecation in favor of IndusInd Bank
300 + GST per month or part thereof for delays post invoicing of over 90 days/ every annual renewal due date

Non Submission of latest Insurance Policy (duly renewed) / per year of renewal & during entire loan tenure with proper insured name, hypothecation   endorsement and adequate Insured's Declared Value and Comprehensive Insurance coverage without major exclusions
Non Payment of applicable Motor Vehicle Tax (on time leading to issues at RTA)
Non submission of RC with Hypothecation / Name transfers duly effected
Non submission of Udhyam Registration certificate - for MSME / MSE segment only
ROC / CERSAI not done within time lines
Details of Contingent Charges (in ₹ or % as applicable)

We are privileged to have you as our Prospective Customer vide above loan application and sincerely thank you for choosing our Bank to avail yourself of the loan facility. We have furnished all the relevant details relating to your loan application in this communication. We believe that our Sourcing Executive has explained all terms and conditions which you need to know. However, in case you require any further clarifications, you may feel free to contact us at any time.

b. This reference rate is subject to change based on statutory guidelines announced by the Regulatory Authority and policies of the Bank from time to time as may be applicable at the relevant point of time. Fixation of rate on the basis MCLR is applicable if the loan is a fixed rate loan up to 3 years of tenure.

9) We draw reference to Clauses 2 (v) & 3 (ii) of the agreement and latest Schedule of Charges (SOC) which covers various types of charges including penal charges if any. The current applicable Schedule of Charges can be viewed by clicking on the https://www.indusind.com/content/dam/indusind-corporate/schedule-of-charges/others/SOC-CFD.pdf
10) The Bank reserves the right to assess and levy charges on transactions which are not covered by this schedule, on a case-to-case basis at “Actuals”

11) Charges/Fees shall be levied along with Goods and Service Tax and Cess (GST) as may be applicable from time to time, under Category of service: Banking & Financial services / SAC code: 9971 / Pan based Goods and Service Tax (GST) and our State-specific GST Registration Number is:

12) Creation of various Credit Information Bureaus (CIB), is an initiative of the Government of India and the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) to improve the functionality and stability of the Indian Financial System. This is in line with their efforts to provide an effective mechanism for exchange of information between banks and financial institutions. All banks and Financial Institutions participating in this initiative are required to share their customer data with such CIBs. In view of the above, we wish to inform you that we shall be reporting the data pertaining to your loan account with us to CIBs periodically. This data will be updated on a regular basis for all our customers.

13) The Bank is authorized to exchange, share, part with all necessary information relating to the identification / other credentials to CERSAI CKYC Registry and obtain CKYC ID pertaining to you and the Co borrower / Guarantor(s) for this loan. The CKYC ID will be communicated to you, for your records and future reference.
14) Insurance is a subject matter of solicitation and that all premium amounts indicated herein are inclusive of GST/ levies (as applicable) and that the insurance products offered are from respective Insurance company and the risk is borne only / solely by the said Insurance company.
15) The bank holds a Corporate Agent (IRDA) License No is CA0001 for Life & General Insurance (Renewed and Valid till 31/03/2025).The Bank currently distributes insurance products manufactured by:

In the event of change in Rate of Interest, penal charges and other charges levied by the Bank, the same will be displayed/ notified at/ by the Bank/ published in the newspapers/ in the website of the Bank i.e., www.indusind.com/ made through an explicit entry in the Loan Account Statement/ Welcome Letter cum Repayment Schedule sent to you/ formally communicated to you (at your registered address/ to your registered email ID/ registered Mobile Number) from time to time.

i.The Sanction Letter & Key Fact Statement (KFS) are given below, basis your loan application.
ii.This Sanction and KFS terms would be held active & valid for a minimum period of 3 working days from today

We request you to quote your Loan No. / Lead No. / Application No. in all your future correspondence or for any queries relating to this Loan Application. This will help us to respond quickly to your needs.
You may choose to go through the details and decide to “Accept” or “Reject” the sanction within the said 3 working days.

iii.For both (a) Digitally generated Sanction Letter and Key Fact Statement shared vide SMS embedded URL link and/ or (b) Physically printed and shared Sanction Letter and Key Fact Statement, the validity period would be 3 working days from the date of generation (or) printing
iv.Post that validity period, the URL would be inactive and would not allow marking of your “Acceptance” or “Rejection”
v.In case of physical mode, the Bank would consider your acceptance basis receipt of signed and duly acknowledged copy at its Branch/ designated outlet office.
vi.During this validity period, the Bank confirms that the terms would not get changed (or) revised and you would be allowed to avail yourself of the loan on the same financial terms and conditions as indicated herein.

vii. Where you have not chosen your option/ given the consent within the validity period and still want to avail the loan, the Bank would be at liberty to offer the Sanction on similar terms (or) decide to change any of the financial terms and conditions governing the loan offer and share with you a revised set of Sanction Letter and KFS afresh.
viii. The loan start date, 1st and 2nd repayment due dates, Instalment amounts, total loan agreement value etc. may vary basis the actual date of disbursement and amounts disbursed.
ix. The initial month’s interest computed and payable would vary based on the actual date of loan booking and disbursement. Final details basis the actual loan booking would be formally shared by the Bank, post-facto.
x. Make and Model of the Loan Product (as opted) and the asset cost net of any upfront discount (or) subvention offered by Dealer/Manufacturer are as declared by you in your loan application.
xi. This being a computer-generated document bears no signature (from Bank)

4) For loan tenors up to 3 years, Minimum ROI cannot be less than the MCLR applicable for the specific loan tenure on the loan date.
5) Effective ROI (interest) would be computed and charged on the outstanding loan balance and it shall be applicable and payable till the date of actual remittance / realization of dues.
(a) The effective ROI means and refers to a consolidated rate consisting of respective year's MCLR Rate (*) + corresponding Tenor Premium + Credit Risk Premium + Business Strategy Spread etc.
(b) Effective Rate of Interest (ROI) is the interest percentage charged by the Bank
* It is charged on loan amount(s) disbursed and from date of each tranche of disbursement done
* On the outstanding loan balance, calculated till the date of actual interest remittance and realization of dues by the Bank
* Usually expressed on annual basis (% per annum).

6) In the event of Loan cancellation, interest charges from date of disbursement till the date of refund (in full of all amounts disbursed) will be payable
7) No Pre-closure charges are applicable for loan amounts up to INR 50 Lakhs extended to Micro & Small Enterprises for vehicles / assets used for business purpose with valid URC as on date of loan sanction (only if URC has been submitted to the Bank on or before loan sanction). However, the said waiver is not applicable to vehicles / assets used for farming (or) for personal use, though the Borrower has a valid and active URC.

8) The charges or fees given in the table as in this Sanction Letter and Key Fact Statement template, are subject to change at the sole discretion of the bank and will supersede the values mentioned in this Document or the Loan agreement, once duly communicated to the customers. In future, you are advised to refer to the latest comprehensive Schedule of Charges as in communication sent to you / the template as hosted in Bank's website (www.indusind.com) which gets updated from time to time. In the event of change in any of the charges levied by the Bank,

the same will be displayed/ notified at/ by the Bank/ published in the News Dailies/ in the website of the Bank / made through an explicit entry in the Loan Account Statement/ Welcome Letter cum Repayment Schedule sent to you/ formally communicated to you (at your registered address/ to your registered email ID/ registered Mobile Number) from time to time. All such revisions would be always on a prospective basis unless the changes are prescribed by any regulation and are required to be recovered instantaneously.

a. MCLR means pricing of rupee-based loans on respective year’s basis “Marginal Cost of funds-based Lending Rate”. For loans up-to 3 (three) years, this indicates the minimum rate below which no loan can be granted i.e. ROI cannot be below the applicable MCLR for the respective tenure as published by the Bank from time to time.

I hereby confirm that, I have provided a valid proof of my permanent address and my local / communication address updated in the tab application is different from my permanent address. I request you to send all correspondence for my account number at my local address. In the event of any change in this address, I shall intimate the IndusInd Bank about my new address within two weeks of such change: YES

For Indus Comfort Account: In case there are no salary credits in my account, Bank at its own discretion may withdraw all the benefits provided for salary account holders without any further notice. I understand that any benefits under salary account will stand true till the time the account is eligible under this category. I also authorise IndusInd Bank to convert my salary account to savings account, basis confirmation received from my employer. Also, Bank has the discretion to convert my salary account to a regular account in case there are no salary credits in my account for 3 consecutive months or the salary account proposition is withdrawn at the employer level with due notice. In such events, I should visit the branch and complete the KYC requirements for continuing operations in the account as normal SB account.

In case I fail to comply with Bank’s requirement, Bank may suspend operations or close the account without further notice. I confirm that I will not dispute and raise any legal action against IndusInd Bank towards such remittance/conversion of account status.

DECLARATION: RESIDENT INDIVIDUALS a) l/ We understand that the deposits are accepted in accordance with the directives laid down by the Reserve Bank of India from time to time. l/ We understand that these deposits and their payments are governed by the laws in force from time to time in India and are payable at the branch of IndusInd Bank in India where the deposits were made. The Bank has discretion to allow withdrawal of the deposits, either at the branch of deposit or at any other branch in India. (b) I/ We further unconditionally and irrevocably authorise IndusInd Bank Ltd. to debit my/ our account with an amount equivalent to the fees and charges applicable for the services enjoyed by me/ us. (c) I/ We agree to indemnify and hold the Bank harmless in case of any loss suffered by the Bank, its customers or a third party or any claim or action brought by the third party which is in any way the result of availing of services by me/ us.

I confirm that the following consent is well within my capacity as a Non-Resident Indian and by doing so I do not violate or breach in any manner the regulations or statutes of the country of my residence as are applicable to me.Notwithstanding anything contained herein above, in case I/we opt out from the above and tick ‘NO’ below, the Bank shall be entitled to use/share/disclose my communication contact addresses/details to send me/us all communicationeitherthroughselect/mandatedcommunicationchannels,thosethat are deemed necessary for the(A)smooth processing of my/our account operations/service request(s) (B)for general awareness and/or(C) any statutory action required to be undertaken by me/us as per the applicable laws and guidelines/regulations/directions/notifications prescribed by the Reserve Bank of India, Ministry of Finance India, government/quasi-government authorities and any other authorities governing the financial and banking operations whether in India or outside india.

s. (d) In case of joint accounts, instruction received from one of the account holders to stop operations will be deemed to be sufficient notice to the Bank to act upon such instructions. Further operations would be allowed only upon receipt of fresh instructions from all the account holders. (e) I/ We agree that all the information disclosed above is correct and agree to inform you of any change in the information provided in this form or in related documents.(f) l/ We confirm having read the rules of the Bank regarding the conduct of the account and the rules and regulations pertaining to Phone Banking, Debit Card, Doorstep Banking, Anywhere Banking, Net Banking, Mobile Banking, Video Banking & Utilities Pay Facilities. l/ We accept and agree to comply with the terms & conditions or any rules of the Bank that may be in force from time to time.

l/ We acknowledge that it is my/ our responsibility to obtain a copy of and read the same. (g) In case the account remains overdrawn on account of unrecovered charges, if any for a period of 3 months and above, the account will be closed and the Bank will not be responsible for giving any advance intimation thereof. (h) I/ We also understand that the continuation of the account is at IndusInd Bank’s sole discretion and in case IndusInd Bank is dissatisfied with the conduct of the account, IndusInd Bank has the right to close the account after giving me/ us 15 days notice or withdraw the concessions in all or any service charges granted to me/ us or charge IndusInd Bank’s applicable rates for such services.

(i) I/ We understand that as my/our accounts is a Basic Savings Bank Deposit Account (Small) under Simplified KYC Process, at any point of time if the total balance or the total yearly turnover in all my/our account exceed `50,000/- and `1 lac respectively, or the aggregate of all withdrawals and transfers in a month exceed rupees ten thousand, unless I/ We complete the required KYC requirement, the Bank will be entitled to close the account. (j) For BSBDA and BSBDA (Small) account: I/ We understand that as my/ our account is a Basic Savings Bank Deposit Account/ Basic Savings Bank Deposit (Small) Account, I/ we cannot hold any other account in this bank. I/ We confirm that I/ we are not having any other bank account in my/ our name in this bank. Also if I/ we have any other account I/ we shall get the same closed within 30 days of opening of this account.

(k) I/ We authorise the Bank or its agents to make references/ enquiries as may be necessary and to exchange/share/ part with any/ all information with credit bureaus/statutory bodies/ other agencies as may be deemed necessary or appropriate. In the event of the death of the depositor, premature termination will be allowed without levy of penal charge. The following will be applicable on demise of all or sole deposit holders With nomination: The nominee will have the right to seek premature termination of term deposit account, Without nomination: Premature termination will be permitted on joint request by all legal heirs (or any of them as mandated by all the legal heirs) and upon verification of the authority of the legal heirs.Following will be applicable on demise of one of the joint deposit holders: If the specific instructions for premature withdrawal are other than jointly, then in the event of death of one of the depositors,

premature termination and payment of Term Deposits shall be allowed to survivor/(s) i.e In the event of the death of any of the deposit holders, the survivor, if he/she so requests the Bank , to prematurely withdraw the deposit without seeking the concurrence of the legal heirs of the deceased joint deposit holder, the Bank is entitled to honour the same. Such payment to survivor/s shall give valid discharge to the Bank. I/ We have obtained, read, understood and agree the terms and conditions governing the opening of an account with IndusInd Bank Ltd. (the Bank), and those relating to various services including but not limited to

a) ATM b) Mobile Banking c) Debit Card d) Net Banking e) Payment Gateway f) Bill Pay g) SMS Banking h) Alert Services i) Fixed Deposits/ Recurring Deposits, available at Bank’s website www.indusind.com I/ We certify that all the information furnished by me/us is true. I/ We authorise and give consent to the Bank or its agents to make references/ enquiries as may be necessary and to disclose, without notice to me/us, information furnished by me/us in application form(s)/related documents or exchange/ share/ part with any/ all information including financial details with credit bureaus/ statutory bodies/Regulatory Authority / Law enforcement authority, other agencies as may be deemed necessary or appropriate, at any point of time. I also authorise the Bank to disclose the information relating to Bank Guarantee/Letter of Credit facility if any availed by me/us. l/We waive the privilege of privacy & privity of contract.

Consent to Use, Share and Disclose Registered Communication Contact Details I/We hereby ACCEPT, AUTHORISE, CONFIRM AND PERMIT IndusInd Bank Limited (“Bank”) to USE, SHARE AND DISCLOSE any/all of my/our registered communication contact addresses/details (postal, e-mail, mobile number, social media platforms/channels etc.), that I/we have willingly registered/shared with the Bank for the purpose of(A)receiving information, either from the Bank, Central KYC Registry and/or through any of the Bank’s authorised Service Providers / Agency(ies)/Professional Advisors related to the operations of my/our account(s)/services availed by me /us from the Bank; and/or

(B) API based authentication where my/our details are being auto fetched/ populated to process my banking requests/applications on/through the Bank’s Web Applications/Systems; and/or (C) any kind of promotional/research/feedback based exercise about the Bank’s products/services that I/we must/may be made aware for general consumption or to provide feedback as an existing customer of the Bank; until such time I request/notify the Bank to stop sending communication to any/all of my/our registered communication addresses/details as per the Bank’s defined process and knowing that the Bank will ensure security and confidentiality to all my communication contact details provided by me/us. If I am /we are or become a Non Resident Indian (NRI) / foreign national,

DISCLAIMER: This material is for general informational purposes only and is not investment advice nor does it constitute an offer, recommendation or solicitation to buy or sell a particular financial instrument. It does not have regard to the specific investment objectives, financial situation, risk profile or the particular needs of any specific person who may receive this material. No representation is made that the information contained herein is accurate in all material respects, complete or up to date. Recipients of this document are to contact the representative in their local jurisdiction or contact details given in this document with regard to any matters or questions arising from, or in connection with, the document.

The information contained herein is not intended for distribution to, or use by, any person in any jurisdiction where such distribution or use would be contrary to applicable law or regulation or which would subject IndusInd Bank to additional licensing or registration requirements. It may not be copied, reproduced, posted, transmitted or redistributed in any form without the prior written consent of the Bank. This publication is for general information only, without addressing any particular needs of any individual or entity, and should not be relied upon without obtaining specific advice in the context of specific circumstances

UIM - CFD customer requesting top up on their own CFD financed car
UOB - Customer buying a used car with an existing loan from seller/dealer/DSA
UOM - Customer buying a loan free car from seller/dealer/DSA
UPD - Customer buying used car from OEM based dealers like True Value
